document_data.name: Slithering Serpent
document_data.mainbody: The '''Slithering Serpent Inn''' was one of the nicer taverns and inns in [[City of Serpents]], the City of Serpents of the [[Vilhon Reach]].

Location.Atmosphere: The Slithering Serpent's clientele was known to eagerly share stories of the city's past glory, with the tale or the [[House Extaminos]] saving the city-state from an army of [[kobold]]s in the {{Yearlink|527}} being the most popular.

document_data.Services: The establishment offered lively conversation, food, and lodgings to visitors and locals alike. One of the most popular staples of the Slithering Serpent was, ironically, the dish called [[black adder stew]].
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, [[Adamar Session]], [[Bard]] of [[Starmantle]], visited the Slithering Serpent Inn during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Reach. Adamar praised the so-called "home of the [[yuan-ti]]" and highly recommended the Slithering Serpent's black adder stew in his guidebook to the Vilhon Reach.
